```typescript
export type UserLite = {
    id: ID;
    username: string;
    host: string | null;
    name: string;
    onlineStatus: "online" | "active" | "offline" | "unknown";
    avatarUrl: string;
    avatarBlurhash: string;
    alsoKnownAs: string[];

    emojis: {

        url: string;
    }[];

        softwareVersion: Instance["softwareVersion"];

        faviconUrl: Instance["faviconUrl"];

};
```
